string.name: name
string.value: Restoring the Memory of the Ancient Bow
#b#@9201122:##k in #b#m101010102##k says he'd like to restore his lost memory.

He said his memory has been sealed, and has asked you to hunt the #rGreen Mushrooms#k nearby and bring back 20 #rMemory Fragments#k.\n\nReport back to #b#@9201122:##k in #b#m101010102##k upon completion.
The legend of the bow was about #rSolomon's Bow#k. But something seems incomplete.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 3,500 #Wbasic# #i4032483:# #t4032483:# #c4032483# 1 Able to proceed to 'Another Storyteller' as next quest.

...

Something must be wrong. That's why you're here to see me, right?

Did you know...?

Every event in this world happens according to one's destiny.
Your coming here to find me today means it is time for me to awaken.

Will you wake me?

...

When I was sealed, my memory shattered into pieces and the #rGreen Mushrooms#k at all of the fragments.

I know you won't be able to recover all of the fragments, but can you hunt them and collect 20 of my #rMemory Fragments#k?

I've been sealed here for a long time.

I don't know why but my abilities haven't come back.

Someone must have taken my abilities and squandered it away.

Alas, I am nothing but a regular Bow.

But wait! I just remembered something!

First, go over to #bPerion#k.

I vaguely remember seeing someone I knew there. At least your efforts to restore my memory wasn't a complete waste of time.
Collect 20 #rMemory Fragment#k. Don't come to me until you finish collecting all 20.
